title: Leek and ham mornay
ingredients: ['6 medium leeks, trimmed and cut in half lengthways and rinsed', '50g butter', '2 heaped tablespoons plain flour', '550ml milk', '100g cheddar, grated', '1 teaspoon strong English mustard', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '12 slices ham', '2 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs']
